import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SignUp() { const onSignUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const form = document.signinForm const data = { email: form.email.value, password: form.password.value, } const users = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('users')) console.log(data.email) if (!users) { localStorage.setItem('users', JSON.stringify([data])) } else if (isUserSignedUp(users, data.email)) { localStorage.setItem('users', JSON.stringify([data])) } else { alert('You are already signed up') } } const isUserSignedUp = (users, email) => { console.log(users) users.forEach((user) => { if (user.email === email) { return false } }) return true } return (
SignUp

) } export default SignUp
